post.body: i know!! his initials are BMW. pete wentz was in the paper defending the name, saying it was "cool" lolol.
as soon as you go to college, all spelling and basic math go out of the window. unless it's just a design student thing lol
i've always wanted to see that movie, but i want to read the book first, but i haven't gotten my hands on a copy yet D:
this song is totally stuck in my head now lol
sleepless long nights, that is what my youth was for :)
playing animal crossing. my sabertooth tiger is complete!
slept and shopped all day and now im watching dan play animal crossing
finally done knitting dishcloth #1. two more to go!
slept all day again (4-midnight?). now i must finish this dishcloth and start another (perhaps a knit-purl one?)
also, i woke up at 5am today and i can feel myself starting to crash.
i have the worst headache ever
dl-ing The Doors discography, listening to I Love Math, discussing using Tetris as the maybebaby's middle name & now im going to get dressed
going to sleep somewhat early tonight, so hopefully i'll wake up around noon and not after dark..
also, i slept from 5am until 7:30pm today, getting up twice to get a drink and check the internet.
EXPORTING MY & NICOLE'S FIGHT
i just woke up and i want to go back to sleep already
i slept for a few hours this afternoon. i have no energy to do anything.
to do today: shower, knit 1/4 of washcloth, design some felt ornaments on paper, draw some lines in the form of a person. sounds good.
Checking out my TweetStats! http://tweetstats.com/graphs/samanthamaryann
my insides are feeling weird. hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm.
i'm playing n64 tetris with dan and killing him with lines, but i keep killing myself, so he wins anyway. of course.
DAN IS STARING AT ME
all right, it's been 3 hours, maybe i should get back to work and bake some cookies
....numerati was dumb.
downloading games for my mac from apple.com. woo numerati. i hope it's not lame.
tomorrow im going to the dollarama to get some stuff to make christmas decorations. im kind of really excited.
i rearranged the 3 tables in the living room & it's totally weird working on this smaller & higher table. i hope it'll reduce clutter though
making roasted potatoes AND potato fries. i must have cut and peeled twenty of them.
my last update was the 256th, which is my favourite number :)
numerati was not a fun mac game. neither was any of the others i downloaded. colour soduko was weird.
i dont understand girls
finished the third dishcloth finally
i finally got a hang of using the ISO on my camera, a year and a half later. i can't believe how crisp my no-flash pictures are.
it's only 7:30, i totally thought it was 11pm.
sick :(
What Movie Is Your Christmas Most Like? - http://tinyurl.com/58gk24 - Your Christmas is Most Like: A Very Brady Christmas #blogthings
ALSO I AM BORED OUT OF MY MIND
i downloaded all of the twilight books in pdf files.. i just want to see what all of this hype is about, i suppose.
just decorated my desktop with (not so merry) christmas icons from pixelgirlpresents and a Merry Trekmas desktop picture :) i am nerdy
i have the worst headache ever D:
i feel like i havent eaten in a week, but i am too tired to get up -__-
personal best on Alchemy - Wizard 1st Class 8238 pts, 46 minutes
roguewave played on the grocery store speakers today. i wish they played constantly there.
i'm going to try my hand at Oh My Star's Fair-Isle knitted hat pattern.
i gave up vegetarianism today!
why does Death Cab's Your Heart Is An Empty Room make me want to get up and dance and scream and laugh and sing?
eating two weeks worth of advent calendar and watching charlie brown's christmas
i just taught myself how to crochet :D
just got my blood test. results tomorrow!
watching the ALF christmas special :D
chloe is a maniac
nooooo it's amy's last snl! the weekend update is my favourite part and it's not going to be the same without her :(
i think i want to organize my fruit trees into quadrants
the sims runs like a dream on this computer. oh man.
anxiously awaiting for my sims torrent to finish. 98% done!!
i just planted a ton of flowers in animal crossing. i hope i get a lot of hybrids soon!
hot pepper pizza and gingerale do not mix. at all.
last time was december 8th or 9th?! i've missed you so much bedroom.
sleeping in my bed again for the first time IN FOREVER
sims2 is half way done!
my sister picked up Personal Trainer Cooking for me with some of my christmas. so far, i dont really think i would want to eat a lot of this
i found an animal crossing town tune site with "tabs" for a lot of popular songs. my favourite so far is the final fantasy chocobo theme.
im suddenly excited about fashion again? the flickr group fashion_remix is so cool
less is more
my body is melting
playing animal crossing with dan and steve and i am locked out of both of their towns because PEOPLE DONT KNOW HOW TO OPEN THIER GATES
A THUNDERSTORM ON BOXING DAY??????
if this rain was snow, my house would be buried by now
playing my OWN animal crossing! dan is in my town somwhere. oh, at goldie's house. she's cool.
making pizza with dan at 4am on christmas eve
batteries are charging. i also have to finish joanne's name tag and something else, but i can't remember what. hmm
todo: charge batteries, straighten hair, pack dan's gift, find skipbo or are you smarter than a 5th grader, and um, sleep???
